name: Uselessfunfacts
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: It is always a good idea to have some fact or interesting observation on the tip of your tongue so you can participate in jovial banter with friends. This flash briefing will give you one each morning that can be used to wow people with how useless some facts can be.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
